tasks.build: deno task build:linux && deno task build:windows && deno task build:macos
tasks.build:linux: deno compile --output build/valtown-mcp-linux --include prompts/townie.txt --include prompts/opentownie.txt --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --allow-net --allow-env --allow-read mod.ts
tasks.build:windows: deno compile --output build/valtown-mcp-windows.exe --include prompts/townie.txt --include prompts/opentownie.txt --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --allow-net --allow-env --allow-read mod.ts
tasks.build:macos: deno compile --output build/valtown-mcp-macos --include prompts/townie.txt --include prompts/opentownie.txt --target x86_64-apple-darwin --allow-net --allow-env --allow-read mod.ts
